text: Everything's Gonna Be Great () is a 1998 Turkish black comedy movie directed by Ömer Vargı and starring Cem Yılmaz, Mazhar Alanson, Ceyda Düvenci, Selim Naşit Özcan, Mustafa Uzunyılmaz, Adnan Tönel. ==Other websites== * Category:1998 comedy movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:Turkish movies Category:Movies set in Istanbul Category:Movies directed by Ömer Vargı
title: Everything's Gonna Be Great
